title: Starbucks enters Laos with Maxim’s Caterers
dc:creator: Retail Asia
description:
read the original version on: www.retailnews.asia

US coffee chain Starbucks has expanded its footprint into Laos under the partnership with its licensee Coffee Concepts, a subsidiary of Hong Kong-based Maxim’s Caterers. The Laos launch marks Starbucks’ 84th market globally, “reaffirming the company’s long-term commitment to continued growth across Southeast Asia” the company said in a statement. Coffee Concepts already operates more […]
